title: Tyra Banks seen at dinner with a potential new man two nights in a row at the same eatery in NYC
text:
She's ruled the runway herself, and led the search for America's next top model as well.

On Wednesday night, model and entrepreneur Tyra Banks was seen out to dinner with Canadian businessman Louis Bélanger-Martin in New York City, and the twosome 'seemed quite intimate,' as reported by Page Six according to an inside source.

The 45-year-old supermodel was spotted at the swanky Hutong Northern Chinese restaurant on Manhattan's East Side with the executive, the same eatery where they dined the previous evening with a third person.

A new beau for Tyra? Tyra Banks has been repeatedly seen with Canadian businessman Louis Bélanger-Martin over the last few months, like here in Santa Monica in September, and this week the twosome were spotted being 'quite intimate' at dinner in NYC —two nights in a row

While they reportedly sipped white wine and sampled some dim sum with their friend on Tuesday, during their tete-a-tete the next night 'the two were definitely on a romantic date,' the source told Page Six.

'But [they] kept the PDA low-key,' they added.

Apparently, Tyra succeeded in remaining incognito for the Tuesday outing, dressing in super casual sweatpants.

But when she returned with Louis on Wednesday, she was reportedly 'dressed to the nines' and was 'joking around with servers that they might not even recognize her without her sweatpants.'

Fierce and fashionable: The supermodel was spotted at the swanky Hutong restaurant on Wednesday with the executive, the same eatery where they dined the previous evening; seen here the same day at a Nine West pop-up event

This is not the first time the pair have been spotted or even photographed together, but up until now Bélenger-Martin was only referred to as a 'mystery man.'

In August, they were snapped in front of a crowd of onlookers in Los Angeles, California with Tyra in all black, and the next month they were again seen in Santa Monica together on a coffee run.

In those most recent images, Banks is dressed down in rolled up sweats and a two-tone hoodie, and she is seen arm in arm with the French Canadian.

This is not the first time the pair have been spotted or even photographed together: But up until now Bélenger-Martin was only referred to as a 'mystery man'

Casual: The next month they were again seen in Santa Monica on a coffee run, as shown above

According to Page Six, Bélenger-Martin was formerly the vice chairman of Global Eagle, an in-flight entertainment company, and serves as a board member for GGI International. He is a certified public accountant.

Banks was previously linked to photographer Erik Asla from 2013 until their split in 2017.

Tyra and Erik share a son, York Banks Asla, who is three years old.
description: On Wednesday night, model and entrepreneur Tyra Banks was seen out to dinner with Canadian  businessman Louis Bélanger-Martin in New York City.
